sentences.en: At the mention of Tientsin a swarm of doubts had assailed his over - wrought mind.
sentences.cn: 他的敏活的神经从“天津”二字陡然叠起了一片疑云来了.

sentences.en: Events in Paris wrought a change in British opinion towards France and Germany.
sentences.cn: 巴黎发生的事件改变了英国对法国和德国的看法。

sentences.en: His thin face and large eyes were wrought into an expression of frantic, powerless fury.
sentences.cn: 他的瘦脸和大眼睛都现出一种疯狂无力的愤怒表情.

sentences.en: It lacked the capacity to shape what it had wrought.
sentences.cn: 它无力左右已经形成的局面.

sentences.en: She marveled how she could ever have been wrought upon to marry him!
sentences.cn: 她惊诧自己何以会最终嫁给了他!

sentences.en: The floors were laid in fanciful figures wrought in mosaics of many - coloured marbles.
sentences.cn: 地上都有五彩云石镶嵌的怪兽异禽.

sentences.en: The gates were made of wrought iron.
sentences.cn: 这些大门是用熟铁制成的。

sentences.en: The rattan and wrought-iron chair pictured here costs £125.
sentences.cn: 这张图片中的铁艺藤椅要价125英镑。

sentences.en: The small churchyard was surrounded by a rusted wrought-iron fence.
sentences.cn: 不大的教堂墓地周边围着一圈生锈的熟铁栅栏。

sentences.en: The steel roof has been coloured to match the finish of the original wrought iron.
sentences.cn: 钢屋顶上了色,以便和原先的锻铁外观相搭配.

sentences.en: This concentration of airborne firepower wrought havoc with the enemy forces.
sentences.cn: 这次机载火力的集中攻击给敌军造成很大破坏.

sentences.en: Unutterable destruction and devastation were wrought last autumn.
sentences.cn: 去年秋天造成了无以言宣的破坏和毁灭.

sentences.en: Was it the poems alone which wrought magic change?
sentences.cn: 这种魔术般的回心转意,是不是要完全归功于那几首诗 呢 ?

sentences.en: We have noted the terrible devastation wrought by the Superfortresses from Saipan.
sentences.cn: 我们已经看到,从塞班岛起飞的超级空中堡垒,已造成极其严重的破坏.

sentences.en: Why are you so wrought - up?
sentences.cn: 你为什么要这么紧张 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 切实可行的；可经营的；能工作的
工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；工厂；文学、音乐或艺术作品
工作；影响；受雇用（work的ing形式）
使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进

trans.tran_cn: 做成的， 形成的； 精制的
造成（巨大的破坏或伤害）
